metadata.synopsis: Obelia calls the rest of the hostages to come out.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays after Obelia comes out of the hatch after returning from the Iron Throne and sees that the battle is over. Only plays if the players were confronted by the waveservants.

0.speaker: Obelia Toobin
0.text: It's over. It's finally over. We're safe!
